ResourceHeader.ResourceName: LFR-60S STEREO-A 'DEF' Low Frequency Receiver (2.5 - 160 kHz) - Flux Density
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains definitive 1 min averaged flux density from the STEREO-A WAVES Low Frequency Receiver (LFR) in the frequency range 2.5 - 160 kHz.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Data provided are publicly available. If used in presentations or publications, please acknowledge STEREO/Waves Investigation (M. Maksimovic and S. D. Bale, PIs). We recommend the data users to contact the STEREO/Waves team early in their study. For reporting purposes, we request bibliography information for any publication, etc., using these data. Please send information on the use of this data to: M. Maksimovic (PI).
